question: What is the main objective of the Small Animal Development program?
option1: To provide financial assistance to farmers
option2: To provide free skill training to farmers through NGO
option3: To increase meat production as well as improving the animal resources
answer: To increase meat production as well as improving the animal resources
explanation: The main objective of the Small Animal Development program is to increase meat production as well as improving the animal resources by genetic up-gradation.
